title: Caprice can't wait to start Dancing On Ice despite partner's worries about curse
text:

Caprice says she can’t wait for Dancing On Ice – but her partner fears the show’s curse.

The former model, who has sons Jett and Jax with Ty Comfort, will be on the ITV show in January.

As with Strictly, couples have been created – and split up – by the show. “Ty was a bit dubious, obviously,” said Caprice, 47.

(Image: PA)

“He’s the father of my children. I told him ‘Honey, don’t worry.’

“Famous last words!”

But Caprice says she understands how celebs end up with their pro partners.

“You spend so much time with these people and you get so close, it’s so intense.” Last series saw runner-up Wes Nelson and girlfriend Megan Barton-Hanson split.

Other celebs taking part in next year’s series include Michael Barrymore, former footballer Kevin Kilbane, Steps singer Ian “H” Watkins and Corrie actress Lisa George.
description: EXCLUSIVE: The model says Ty Comfort, father of her two sons, was dubious when she was first approached by ITV talent show
